attributes.action: condemn the EU for rejecting Marta Andreasen (UKIP) as Vice Chairman of the Budget Committee via a secret vote for being "unsuitable".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marta Andreason was formally the EU Chief Accountant. However she was sacked by the EU for revealing the massive fraud and irregularities within the EU budget. She was accused of  "disloyalty and a breech of trust" for revealing the truth. How can the EU reform when it is not willing to look at massive corruption within itself.
